text: Morning, is there a way to output the choice label as well as the value when using the choice field?
Hey all, is there any instagram feed module for HubSpot? i need to integrate a section that the client can show posts from instagram. any thoughts?
there are currently 3 in our marketplace that may help with what you are looking to do: <https://marketplace.HubSpot.com/products?searchTerm=instagram>
